intro: Enter Zumba World – The Crazy Marble Dimension! Dash through Soccer, Candy, Space & Dino realms, blasting marbles before they reach the goal!
description:
Zumba World – The Crazy Marble Dimension marries classic marble-shooter thrills with an explorable hub world! Dash your marble-loaded avatar across a vibrant central plaza dotted with portals to four zany realms:
•	Soccer Stadium Fields – Defend the goal-line against rolling soccer marbles.
•	Candy Kingdom – Halt candy spheres before they flood the sugar gate.
•	Galactic Orbit – Stop cosmic marbles and rogue planets from drifting into the void.
•	Jurassic Ridge – Prevent prehistoric marbles from tumbling off the volcanic cliff.
Select any level portal, then position yourself at the center of winding paths and launch marbles to match three or more identical orbs. Trigger spectacular combos, clear each wave before it crosses your boundary, and earn up to three stars per stage.
Every ten cleared levels, dash back to the hub and advance into the next area. Discover hidden shortcuts, unlock bonus challenges, and collect special tokens that reveal the Crazy Marble Dimension’s secrets. With each realm offering unique marble colors, path shapes, moving obstacles, and escalating speeds, no two expeditions are the same!
Addictive, family-friendly, and endlessly replayable, Zumba World – The Crazy Marble Dimension challenges you to master marble magic across four wildly different themes.
